reviewText: I bought this video for my nephews and they just absolutely love it!!  They were really into the story line and enjoyed all of the songs.  My one nephew watches it 3 or 4 times a day (he's 4 years old) and tries to sing along with the characters.  He even has made up his own dance!  This is a definite must have video that kids and parents can both enjoy.

My children (5 & 8 yrs.) LOVE this DVD and walk around singing the songs all the time.  Finally something that has a great mix of live action, animation, & music.  Your children (& you) will enjoy this DVD.
